alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Hill County; Northern Blaine County; Northern High Plains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 24 at 2:52AM MDT until October 25 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. Winds gusting to as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera, Eastern Toole and Liberty, Hill County, Northern Blaine County, and Northern High Plains. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Hill County; Northern Blaine County; Northern High Plains
